 2003-06282003-05-06,  ,  CITIZENSHIP,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisReappointment of ARTHUR M. KRUGER of Toronto, Ontario, AJIT KAUR SINGH GREWAL of Toronto, Ontario, CLIFFORD DANIEL BERRY of Newmarket, Ontario, and LLOYD J. FOURNIER of Brampton, Ontario, to be full-time members of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective July 3, 2003.
